get.description: List operations for given blueprint assignment within a subscription or a management group.

parameters.name: resourceScope
parameters.description: The scope of the resource. Valid scopes are: management group (format: '/providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/{managementGroup}'), subscription (format: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}').

200.description: OK -- all blueprint assignment operations retrieved.

value.description: List of AssignmentOperation.

items.description: Represents underlying deployment detail for each update to the blueprint assignment.

id.description: String Id used to locate any resource on Azure.

blueprintVersion.description: The published version of the blueprint definition used for the blueprint assignment operation.

assignmentState.description: State of this blueprint assignment operation.

timeCreated.description: Create time of this blueprint assignment operation.

timeStarted.description: Start time of the underlying deployment.

timeFinished.description: Finish time of the overall underlying deployments.

deployments.description: List of jobs in this blueprint assignment operation.

items.description: Represents individual job in given blueprint assignment operation.

action.description: Name of the action performed in this job.

error.description: Contains error details if deployment job failed.

resources.description: Resources created as result of the deployment job.

items.description: Azure resource created from deployment job.

id.description: String Id used to locate any resource on Azure.

history.description: Result of this deployment job for each retry.

items.description: Result of each individual deployment in a blueprint assignment.

error.description: Contains error details if deployment job failed.

resources.description: Resources created as result of the deployment job.

items.description: Azure resource created from deployment job.

id.description: String Id used to locate any resource on Azure.

requestUri.description: Reference to deployment job resource id.

nextLink.description: Link to the next page of results.

put.description: Create or update a blueprint assignment.

parameters.name: resourceScope
parameters.description: The scope of the resource. Valid scopes are: management group (format: '/providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/{managementGroup}'), subscription (format: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}').

id.description: String Id used to locate any resource on Azure.

location.description: The location of this blueprint assignment.

identity.description: Managed identity for this blueprint assignment.

principalId.description: Azure Active Directory principal ID associated with this Identity.

tenantId.description: ID of the Azure Active Directory.

userAssignedIdentities.description: The list of user-assigned managed identities associated with the resource. Key is the Azure resource Id of the managed identity.

principalId.description: Azure Active Directory principal ID associated with this Identity.

clientId.description: Client App Id associated with this identity.

blueprintId.description: ID of the published version of a blueprint definition.

scope.description: The target subscription scope of the blueprint assignment (format: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}'). For management group level assignments, the property is required.

value.description: Parameter value. Any valid JSON value is allowed including objects, arrays, strings, numbers and booleans.

keyVault.description: Specifies the reference to a given Azure Key Vault.

id.description: Azure resource ID of the Key Vault.

secretVersion.description: The version of the secret to use. If left blank, the latest version of the secret is used.

resourceGroups.description: Names and locations of resource group placeholders.

location.description: Location of the resource group.

status.description: Status of blueprint assignment. This field is readonly.

timeCreated.description: Creation time of this blueprint definition.

lastModified.description: Last modified time of this blueprint definition.

managedResources.description: List of resources that were created by the blueprint assignment.

locks.description: Defines how resources deployed by a blueprint assignment are locked.

excludedPrincipals.description: List of AAD principals excluded from blueprint locks. Up to 5 principals are permitted.

excludedActions.description: List of management operations that are excluded from blueprint locks. Up to 200 actions are permitted. If the lock mode is set to 'AllResourcesReadOnly', then the following actions are automatically appended to 'excludedActions': '*/read', 'Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/subnets/join/action' and 'Microsoft.Authorization/locks/delete'. If the lock mode is set to 'AllResourcesDoNotDelete', then the following actions are automatically appended to 'excludedActions': 'Microsoft.Authorization/locks/delete'. Duplicate actions will get removed.

parameters.name: resourceScope

id.description: String Id used to locate any resource on Azure.

status.description: Status of the blueprint. This field is readonly.

timeCreated.description: Creation time of this blueprint definition.

lastModified.description: Last modified time of this blueprint definition.

targetScope.description: The scope where this blueprint definition can be assigned.

values.description: The blueprint targets a subscription during blueprint assignment.
The blueprint targets a management group during blueprint assignment. This is reserved for future use.

parameters.description: Parameters required by this blueprint definition.

type.description: Allowed data types for Resource Manager template parameters.

metadata.description: User-friendly properties for this parameter.

strongType.description: StrongType for UI to render rich experience during blueprint assignment. Supported strong types are resourceType, principalId and location.

allowedValues.description: Array of allowed values for this parameter.

resourceGroups.description: Resource group placeholders defined by this blueprint definition.

name.description: Name of this resourceGroup. Leave empty if the resource group name will be specified during the blueprint assignment.

location.description: Location of this resourceGroup. Leave empty if the resource group location will be specified during the blueprint assignment.

metadata.description: User-friendly properties for this resource group.

strongType.description: StrongType for UI to render rich experience during blueprint assignment. Supported strong types are resourceType, principalId and location.

dependsOn.description: Artifacts which need to be deployed before this resource group.

tags.description: Tags to be assigned to this resource group.

versions.description: Published versions of this blueprint definition.

layout.description: Layout view of the blueprint definition for UI reference.

location.description: The location of this blueprint assignment.

identity.description: Managed identity for this blueprint assignment.

principalId.description: Azure Active Directory principal ID associated with this Identity.

tenantId.description: ID of the Azure Active Directory.

userAssignedIdentities.description: The list of user-assigned managed identities associated with the resource. Key is the Azure resource Id of the managed identity.

principalId.description: Azure Active Directory principal ID associated with this Identity.

clientId.description: Client App Id associated with this identity.

blueprintId.description: ID of the published version of a blueprint definition.

scope.description: The target subscription scope of the blueprint assignment (format: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}'). For management group level assignments, the property is required.

value.description: Parameter value. Any valid JSON value is allowed including objects, arrays, strings, numbers and booleans.

keyVault.description: Specifies the reference to a given Azure Key Vault.

id.description: Azure resource ID of the Key Vault.

secretVersion.description: The version of the secret to use. If left blank, the latest version of the secret is used.

resourceGroups.description: Names and locations of resource group placeholders.

location.description: Location of the resource group.

status.description: Status of blueprint assignment. This field is readonly.

timeCreated.description: Creation time of this blueprint definition.

lastModified.description: Last modified time of this blueprint definition.

managedResources.description: List of resources that were created by the blueprint assignment.

locks.description: Defines how resources deployed by a blueprint assignment are locked.

excludedPrincipals.description: List of AAD principals excluded from blueprint locks. Up to 5 principals are permitted.

excludedActions.description: List of management operations that are excluded from blueprint locks. Up to 200 actions are permitted. If the lock mode is set to 'AllResourcesReadOnly', then the following actions are automatically appended to 'excludedActions': '*/read', 'Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/subnets/join/action' and 'Microsoft.Authorization/locks/delete'. If the lock mode is set to 'AllResourcesDoNotDelete', then the following actions are automatically appended to 'excludedActions': 'Microsoft.Authorization/locks/delete'. Duplicate actions will get removed.

The blueprint targets a management group during blueprint assignment. This is reserved for future use.

parameters.description: Parameters required by this blueprint definition.

type.description: Allowed data types for Resource Manager template parameters.

metadata.description: User-friendly properties for this parameter.

strongType.description: StrongType for UI to render rich experience during blueprint assignment. Supported strong types are resourceType, principalId and location.

allowedValues.description: Array of allowed values for this parameter.

resourceGroups.description: Resource group placeholders defined by this blueprint definition.

name.description: Name of this resourceGroup. Leave empty if the resource group name will be specified during the blueprint assignment.

location.description: Location of this resourceGroup. Leave empty if the resource group location will be specified during the blueprint assignment.

metadata.description: User-friendly properties for this resource group.

strongType.description: StrongType for UI to render rich experience during blueprint assignment. Supported strong types are resourceType, principalId and location.

dependsOn.description: Artifacts which need to be deployed before this resource group.

tags.description: Tags to be assigned to this resource group.

blueprintName.description: Name of the published blueprint definition.

BlueprintStatus.description: The status of the blueprint. This field is readonly.

allOf.description: Shared status properties between all blueprint resources.

timeCreated.description: Creation time of this blueprint definition.

lastModified.description: Last modified time of this blueprint definition.

TemplateArtifactProperties.description: Properties of a Resource Manager template blueprint artifact.

template.description: The Resource Manager template blueprint artifact body.

resourceGroup.description: If applicable, the name of the resource group placeholder to which the Resource Manager template blueprint artifact will be deployed.

parameters.description: Resource Manager template blueprint artifact parameter values.

value.description: Parameter value. Any valid JSON value is allowed including objects, arrays, strings, numbers and booleans.

keyVault.description: Specifies the reference to a given Azure Key Vault.

id.description: Azure resource ID of the Key Vault.

secretVersion.description: The version of the secret to use. If left blank, the latest version of the secret is used.

allOf.description: Shared properties between all blueprint resources.
Common properties shared by different artifacts.

dependsOn.description: Artifacts which need to be deployed before the specified artifact.

roleDefinitionId.description: Azure resource ID of the RoleDefinition.

principalIds.description: Array of user or group identities in Azure Active Directory. The roleDefinition will apply to each identity.

resourceGroup.description: RoleAssignment will be scope to this resourceGroup. If empty, it scopes to the subscription.

ScopeParameter.name: resourceScope
ScopeParameter.description: The scope of the resource. Valid scopes are: management group (format: '/providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/{managementGroup}'), subscription (format: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}').

AssignmentOperationNameParameter.name: assignmentOperationName
AssignmentOperationNameParameter.description: Name of the blueprint assignment operation.

PublishedBlueprintVersionIdParameter.name: versionId
PublishedBlueprintVersionIdParameter.description: Version of the published blueprint definition.
